newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombia drug squad makes large cocaine haul.
newsitem.headline: Colombia drug squad makes large cocaine haul.

text.p: Anti-drugs police seized 3,300 pounds (1,500 kg) of coca paste and purified cocaine from a clandestine narcotics laboratory in the jungles of southeast Colombia on Thursday, officials said.
More than 140 tons of chemicals used to process cocaine were also destroyed in the operation in a remote region in the Miraflores municipality, in Guaviare province, a police spokesman said.
One man was arrested on charges of arms trafficking and illegal possession of weapons.
